channel.title: A on Our Remedies
channel.description: Recent content in A on Our Remedies

item.title: Allergies
item.description: Specific Nu Valens - 3 at night Corn - Dioxin base (from paper products/corn kernels) - Nu Valens Animal dander, hair, etc - Nu Ease (1+1) Wheat - Add Nu Ease (1+1) Rubber (Mercury poisoning) - Nu Passant Pollen - Nu Zareba (3 at night) Perfumes - Nu Passant (3 + 3 + 3) Dairy - Nu Obdurate (3 once a day) Mold, Mildew, etc. - Nu Adjunct (3 + 3)

item.title: Acne
item.description: Hormonal imbalance Nu Passant - 2 in the morning                         2 in the afternoon Nu Locule - 3 in the morning                      3 in the afternoon If outbreaks or lingering acne or scars are purplish in color this indicates a stap infection. Use Nu Squeeg, 3 a day.
